title: Strange bug when jungling. Dealing true damage to turrets on first hit.
body: Im not sure if this is intended but i cant find a post about it anywhere, when i play a jungler using devourer I my first basic attack deals a large chunk of true damage to the lane turrets upon a gank. It happens periodically maybe once every 2 minutes but its a large bit (200-350) of damage that i cant explain from my items runes or masteries. Any thoughts?

replies.body:
In this recent patch towers are way less defensive especially against the jungler here's why:

- Red buff burns tower(New)
- Golem buff grants 'gift of heavy hands' which gives 2 spells  this is the last one 'additionally, you can attack a tower to expend the buff early - dealing a large amount of bonus true damage (65 + 15 x level). This bonus can only be claimed once per spawn,'

(This is probably why Riot made tower hp so high this patch which was actually quite smart)
